name: The Worst Birthday Party EVER!
description:
Alex is stuck at their 8th birthday party and they'd rather be anywhere else. Help them survive the party without getting trapped in conversation with any of their extended relatives, otherwise they might have a meltdown!

Controls:

WASD to move

Hold Shift to run

Hold X to crouch

Hold Space Bar to cry (to release some tension!)

Background Music Credit:

Raving Energy by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5029-raving-energy
